articles.author: Eli Nicholson
articles.title: Denver Broncos: Montrell Washington ‘wanted to cry’ when he got the call - Mile High Report
articles.description: The wide receiver from Samford wasn’t expecting to get drafted, so he was beyond overjoyed when the call came from the Denver Broncos.
articles.content:
Montrell Washington, taken at pick 162 (round 5), admitted that he wanted to cry when he got the call from the Denver Broncos.
The wide receiver displayed a very respectful and down-to-earth approac… [+2800 chars]
